channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Zelensky and Vance discussed U.S. peace plan for Ukraine

item.title: Scoop: Democrat requests police investigation into Trump over "threatening" posts
item.description: Rep. Jason Crow's (D-Colo.) office is seeking a U.S. Capitol Police investigation into President Trump for what they described as "intimidating, threa...

item.title: New York Fed chief raises expectations of a rate cut
item.description: After weeks in which the Federal Reserve's policymakers have seemed more divided over interest rate policy than they've been in years, Friday brought ...

item.title: Zelensky says Trump plan forces Ukraine to choose between "dignity" and the U.S.
item.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky addressed the Ukrainian people on Friday and said President Trump's 28-point peace plan will force Ukraine to choose betw...

item.title: The funniest possible outcome of the December Fed meeting
item.description: The Federal Reserve is deeply divided right now between officials who think it should cut interest rates next month and those who don't. One plausible...

item.title: Classified data likely to delay John Bolton’s trial until 2027
item.description: Determining how to handle classified information is likely to delay the trial of former national security adviser John Bolton.

item.title: Democrats seek police action on Trump’s ‘threatening’ social media posts
item.description: Lawmakers responded to Trump writing that they should be arrested and potentially punished by death for encouraging service members to disobey illegal...

item.title: In reversal, Coast Guard again classifies swastikas, nooses as hate symbols
item.description: The new order came hours after The Post reported the service would instead classify such symbols “potentially divisive” under guidelines set for relea...

item.title: Does the military have to follow unlawful orders? What the oath says.
item.description: Democrats urged members of the military to refuse illegal orders — something President Trump called “seditious.” In fact, service members are bound by...

item.title: Rep. Eric Swalwell, staunch Trump critic, launches bid for California governor
item.description: In an announcement video, the Democratic congressman said he will focus on resistance to the president and making the state more affordable.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
